entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
